Class DbHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • semweb.core.DbHandler

  • public class DbHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the administration functions regarding MongoDb, such as upload and edit files.

    Rik

      • uploadFile

        public void uploadFile(java.lang.String fileNameLocal,
              java.lang.String fileNameDb)
        Upload a file to MongoDB (GridFS)
        Parameters:
        fileName - - Local name of file to be uploaded, or complete path to file, e.g. C:/Users/John/myfile.xml

        key - - String
        value - - Object, e.g. String or DBObject
